summary: Comprehensive testing of Security Awareness Platform P1 features completed. Backend APIs 100% passing (13/13 tests). Frontend UI testing shows all major features working - login, dashboard, advanced analytics with unified stats, simulation builder with edit functionality, phishing and ad simulations pages accessible.
passed_tests: Backend health check returns healthy status
Super admin login with superadmin@vasilisns.com / Admin123!Pass - WORKING
Phishing link tracking (/api/phishing/track/click/{tracking_code}) shows awareness page HTML - P0 FIX VERIFIED
Unified phishing stats (/api/phishing/stats) returns combined phishing + ad campaign data
Unified analytics (/api/analytics/all-campaigns) shows both phishing and ad campaigns with summary
Phishing campaigns API returns campaigns with assigned_module_id field
Phishing templates API returns templates for Simulation Builder
Training modules API accessible and returns modules
Dashboard shows unified stats: 1 Org, 8 Users, 2 Campaigns, 13 Sessions
Advanced Analytics shows Campaign Overview section with Phishing + Ad breakdown
Simulation Builder Saved tab shows templates with Edit and Launch buttons
Edit saved simulation loads template into builder with 'Template loaded for editing' confirmation
Simulation Builder shows EMAIL HEADERS section with From/Subject fields
Building Blocks palette includes CONTENT, FORM ELEMENTS, PHISHING TACTICS categories
critical_code_review_comments: P0 Bug Fix Verified: Phishing link tracking now correctly shows awareness page instead of error
Unified analytics correctly combines phishing and ad campaign stats
Simulation Builder edit functionality properly loads saved templates for editing
seed_data_creation: Using existing test data in test_database
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P1 features tested and working. Phishing tracking shows awareness page. Unified analytics combines phishing + ad campaigns. Simulation Builder edit functionality loads saved templates. Ad campaigns and phishing campaigns APIs accessible. Email notifications require SENDGRID_API_KEY configuration (not tested as external dependency).

features_verified.phishing_link_tracking: PASS - Shows awareness page HTML with personalized content and countdown timer
features_verified.clean_url_tracking: PASS - Returns 200 status code for /{campaign_id}?u={tracking_code} URLs
features_verified.unified_analytics: PASS - Advanced Analytics shows Campaign Overview section with both phishing and ad stats
features_verified.simulation_builder_edit: PASS - Edit button loads saved template with confirmation toast 'Template loaded for editing'
features_verified.training_module_assignment: PASS - Phishing campaigns have assigned_module_id field support
features_verified.ad_simulation_copy_url: PASS - URL/Embed functionality visible in Ad Simulations page

sendgrid_email_notes: SendGrid email notifications require SENDGRID_API_KEY and SENDER_EMAIL to be configured in backend/.env. Currently returns False when not configured (simulation mode).
